subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Qualifying for the 2014 World Cup finals began Wednesday with Belize’s Deon McCauley scoring a hat trick in a 5-2 victory over Montserrat.
snippet: Qualifying for the 2014 World Cup finals began Wednesday with Belize’s Deon McCauley scoring a hat trick in a 5-2 victory over Montserrat.
